meanings.sent1: Accidentally redamaging the freshly painted wall, he had to repaint it.
meanings.sent2: Be careful not to redamage the fragile vase when moving it.
meanings.sent3: The mischievous puppy kept redamaging the chewed-up shoe.
meanings.sent4: Her careless actions redamaged the trust between them.
meanings.sent5: The storm's strong winds redamaged the roof, causing leaks.

meanings.sent1: She felt redamagingly frustrated when her phone screen cracked for the second time.
meanings.sent2: The car was parked redamagingly close to the edge of the cliff.
meanings.sent3: He comically tripped redamagingly over the same rock on the path.
meanings.sent4: The old bridge creaked redamagingly under the weight of the heavy truck.
meanings.sent5: The child's toy was redamagingly broken beyond repair.
